name: Shoal

screenshots.caption: Chromosome Map visualization from genome-in-code package using Shoal Shell
Pathway network visualize using shoal interacting with cytoscape software for bacteria Xanthomonas oryzae oryzicola BLS256 (Right click can download the full size image)
GCModeller virtual cell for dynamics Two-Component System in Xcc 8004

short_description:
Ours organization website GCModeller.org is coming online soon!


Shoal Shell is the sub project for the "genome-in-code"(http://code.google.com/p/genome-in-code/) virtual cell modelling project of the bacteria Xcc 8004.
Shoal Shell aim at provide the modelling tool and the debugging tool for the GCModeller virtual cell modelling, And from the extendible library package, shoal shell can manage to accomplish the entire  modelling job for any other bacteria species. 

Shoal Shell Project needs grownup
I'm just a student in the university, and the shoal shell just in its begining, if you have any idea about shoal, please contact me from xie.guigang@gmail.com. The Shoal shell needs your professional advice.


Try get some help (if you want build the shoal library by yourself): 
https://sourceforge.net/p/shoal/wiki/Shoal%20Developer%20Guide/
summary: A lot of fish in a shoal, in a gigantic scientific ocean.
